ComicInfo.Summary:
Andromeda and Lucien are held captive by the very government they once worked for. Now that THEY are the objects of study, how do they feel about the good old U.S.A? Plus, the Dayaks continue to seek refuge on Earth and a new villain enters the scene.
This issue was intended to be the final chapter of the series but was later picked by another creative team.
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brian Ching,David Finch,Joe Weems,Matt Nelson,Victor Llamas
